name: Lost (itch) (waterskull21)
description:
Pretty simple game for my first game jam, make your way though a facility before your space ship blows up....My game engine glitched and had to restart halfway though

>Controls

Wasd or arrow keys for movement

use your mouse to choose where to shoot

Press R to restart level

>Credits

https://chippy01302.itch.io/chippy-music-pack For All Music

https://omegaosg.itch.io/gameboy-sfx-pack For All Sound Effects

https://0x72.itch.io/pixeldudesmaker For Main Character 

All other assets where made by me 

>If you have any probloms or glitches Message me on discord with (Waterskull21#5169)

> Hope you enjoy :D

>All Made for the mini  jam 63
